Bug and crash fixes.
If you have any issues at all, don’t hesitate to email MobileSupport@panerabread.com.
Crash Fix
Bug fixes.

Use Apple Pay when you place your Panera Bread® purchase on the Panera App and you’ll be eligible to receive an Apple Pay exclusive offer of a free cookie on a future purchase from Panera.

Must be a MyPanera member to receive reward. Free cookie reward will be loaded to your MyPanera account within 5 days of eligible purchase. Offer only valid on Panera Mobile App with Apple Pay purchase. Minimum $10 purchase required in a single Apple Pay transaction exclusive of taxes and delivery fees. Only MyPanera members are eligible. Limit one free cookie per MyPanera member per week. Offer valid 7/1/16 – 9/1/16.

Gift card payments secured with PIN
Reduced storage usage

Miscellaneous bug fixes including Apple Pay.

We’ve updated the app to enhance your overall ordering experience. It’s now easier than ever to reorder your recent orders on the go through the Rapid Reorder flow. Tap the Reorder button on the home screen to add items from your recent Rapid Pick-Up or Delivery orders quickly.

We’ve updated the app to improve your experience (and look great too!) It’s now easier than ever to customize your order and checkout. Take it for a spin, then let us know what you think at https://panera.custhelp.com/.

We’ve updated the app to enhance your overall ordering experience. It’s now easier than ever to reorder your recent orders on the go through the Reorder flow. Tap the Reorder button on the home screen to add items from your recent Rapid Pick-Up orders quickly. Allergen information has also been added to our product pages.

We've updated the app to improve your overall experience, including a few enhancements to make it easier to reset your password and sign-in. Tap "see all" under the ingredients header on our product pages to see detailed ingredient information.

Coffee lovers rejoice! Introducing the MyPanera+ Coffee Subscription program. Sign up through the app to gain access to unlimited Panera hot coffee, hot tea and iced coffee for the price of about 4 cups. You can redeem your subscription once up to every two hours with unlimited refills while you’re in the café. Subscribe today, have some coffee, and do great things.

We've updated the app to improve your experience, including a few enhancements to scanning a credit card to save to your account, as well as making it easier to find applicable items for your rewards when adding a reward from your cart.

We've updated the app to improve your experience. All delivery orders will now be delivered contact free to ensure social distancing for you and our drivers. For Rapid Pick-Up orders, an associate will meet you at the cafe door or at your car for safer and easier pick-up. Fill out the order instructions field with details to help us get your order to you.

We've updated the app to improve your experience. For rapid-pick up orders placed on the app, tap the "I'm Here" button in the app to let the café know you've arrived, and we will bring your order to you.

Want free unlimited Panera coffee for the rest of the year? Get 5 friends to subscribe to MyPanera+ Coffee and you'll all be sipping free until New Year’s!

Find your referral link where you manage your subscription, and share it with friends via social media, text, or email.

Reordering your favorite meals just got a whole lot easier with Siri Shortcuts. At the end of an order, find the “Add to Siri” option to take ease of reordering to a new level.

Your safety is our top priority. When placing your order, choose from In-Cafe or Curbside Pick-Up to get your food whichever way you want.

Your safety is our top priority. When placing your order, choose from In-Cafe or Curbside Pick-Up to get your food whichever way you want.

Fall is back! Get a taste of your seasonal favorites and try our new Broccoli Cheddar Mac & Cheese!

Just as Autumn brings the changing of the leaves, it brings a new menu look to our app. Explore the mouth-watering detail of our delicious sandwiches, salads, and more with our newly enhanced imagery.

Fall is back! Get a taste of your seasonal favorites and try our new Broccoli Cheddar Mac & Cheese!

Just as Autumn brings the changing of the leaves, it brings a new menu look to our app. Explore the mouth-watering detail of our delicious sandwiches, salads, and more with our newly enhanced imagery.

In collaboration with World Resources Institute (WRI), we’ve become the first national restaurant company to label low carbon “Cool Food Meals” on our menu—those meals that have a low impact on the climate, making them a delicious way to help the planet.

More than half of our entrees are Cool Food Meals—including favorites like the Chipotle Chicken Avocado Melt, 10 Vegetable Soup, Fuji Apple Chicken Salad – and even Broccoli Cheddar Soup. Now you’ll see these labels across our Panera app and website on the product description pages.

New Flatbread Pizzas are here! With loads of fresh mozzarella, craveable ingredients layered on top of a savory sauce and crunchy crust, it’s hard to pick just one. Enjoy all 3 flavors: Margherita, Chipotle Chicken & Bacon, and Cheese.

Ordering from Panera has never been easier. Now you can create Siri Shortcuts within the Shortcuts app and order your favorite Panera items with a tap or saying “Hey Siri”.

‘Tis the season for Coffee! Give the gift of a MyPanera+ Coffee Unlimited Coffee Subscription to family and friends. Purchase 2 months for $15 or 3 months for $20 directly through the app.

Ring in the New Year with Coffee! Give the gift of a MyPanera+ Coffee Unlimited Coffee Subscription to family and friends. Purchase 2 months for $15 or 3 months for $20 directly through the app.

We’re starting off 2021 strong with three new must-try menu items! Say hello to our latest craveable Flatbread Pizzas—Pepperoni and Four Cheese—plus our new sweet and savory Teriyaki Chicken & Broccoli Bowl. Stop by and try them for lunch or dinner today!

Plus, curbside pick-up is now easier than ever with our new Pick-Up Parking. When you arrive at the bakery-café to pick up your order, simply park in a numbered spot and tap “I'm Here” in our app. It’s that easy!

Spring is in the air with your favorite seasonal flavors, back again! Enjoy a Strawberry Poppyseed Salad with Chicken, full of fresh berry goodness. We’re also dishing out our hearty Summer Corn Chowder for lunch and dinner—don’t forget the Bread Bowl!

Plus, curbside pick-up is now easier than ever with our new Pick-Up Parking. When you arrive at the bakery-café to pick up your order, simply park in a numbered spot and tap “I'm Here” in our app. It’s that easy!

Savor spring-loaded flavor with our delicious seasonal menu items! Don’t miss our vibrant Strawberry Poppyseed Salad with Chicken or vegetarian-friendly Summer Corn Chowder, both back for a limited time. Pair either with a refreshing Frozen Strawberry Lemonade and a Lemon Drop Cookie. 

Plus, add our new Reorder Widget to your iPhone home screen to quickly and easily reorder your Panera favorites.

Serve up summery flavor all month with our delicious seasonal and flavorful favorites! Strawberry Poppyseed Salad with Chicken and Summer Corn Chowder are back for a limited time, while standards such as our Chipotle Chicken Avocado Melt and Turkey Avocado BLT spice up summer days. Be sure to try our new Pepperoni Flatbread Pizza, too — it packs sizzle in every slice.

Also, be sure to try out the new Menu Search feature in our app, which makes it quicker and easier to explore our delicious menu options!

Plus, if you love ordering Panera for pick-up, sign up for our new SMS Order Notifications and we’ll send you text messages when your order is received and ready to go.
